description.en:
What is the project about?
Qitmeer Network is a public blockchain based on the MeerDAG consensus, aiming to provide comprehensive solutions for distributed applications and organizations.

What makes your project unique?
Qitmeer Network aims to achieve on-chain scalability without sacrificing security or decentralization, and to provide a high-performance available infrastructure for future financial application scenarios.
Qitmeer's self-developed MeerDAG consensus, which combines PoW consensus and the UTXO model, has found the perfect balance between decentralization, security and scalability, and established a secure, stable, EVM-compatible network of high-performance available infrastructure.

History of your project.
March 2018 - Technical selection
June 2019 - Code open source
December 2019 - Test network launched
September 2020 - Test network hard fork upgrade
June 2021 - Test network ended
September 2021 - Mainnet launched
September 2022 - Mainnet soft fork upgraded to QNG network

What’s next for your project?
We have completed the launch of the mainnet and further achieved compatibility with EVM, and will continue to implement a more robust smart contract layer in the future to establish a multi-chain interconnected cross-chain hub.

What can your token be used for?
Value storage and transfer, micro-payment, smart contract application Gas

description.uk:
What is the project about?
Qitmeer Network is a public blockchain based on the MeerDAG consensus, aiming to provide comprehensive solutions for distributed applications and organizations.

What makes your project unique?
Qitmeer Network aims to achieve on-chain scalability without sacrificing security or decentralization, and to provide a high-performance available infrastructure for future financial application scenarios.
Qitmeer's self-developed MeerDAG consensus, which combines PoW consensus and the UTXO model, has found the perfect balance between decentralization, security and scalability, and established a secure, stable, EVM-compatible network of high-performance available infrastructure.

History of your project.
March 2018 - Technical selection
June 2019 - Code open source
December 2019 - Test network launched
September 2020 - Test network hard fork upgrade
June 2021 - Test network ended
September 2021 - Mainnet launched
September 2022 - Mainnet soft fork upgraded to QNG network

What’s next for your project?
We have completed the launch of the mainnet and further achieved compatibility with EVM, and will continue to implement a more robust smart contract layer in the future to establish a multi-chain interconnected cross-chain hub.

What can your token be used for?
Value storage and transfer, micro-payment, smart contract application Gas
